positions.title: Business Development Specialist
positions.description:
Immigration.ca, #1 Google ranked, is the most recognized legal practice in the Canadian immigration industry, on-line.

It is the only one-word domain name in the industry and since its inception, it has been consistently rated the most popular non-government Canadian immigration web site by Google.

We provide unparalleled counsel and expertise to foreign nationals intending to relocate to Canada, the United States, the United Kingdom and Australia on a temporary or permanent basis.

The firm acts as legal counsel on immigration matters, to a number of Canadian based institutions and a myriad of domestic and international corporate businesses. This aspect of our practice affords us an in-depth understanding of Canada's business and labour market landscape and adds to our ability to counsel clients who intend to relocate foreign nationals to Canada.

We regularly provide insight and commentary to Canada’s national media and US based media, Canadian citizenship and immigration personnel and foreign representatives both in Canada and abroad when immigration policy is reviewed or modified by the Federal and Provincial Governments. 

The latest media items below (video content), is a confirmation of our highly respected standing in the Canadian immigration industry.

headline: People Partner | Growth Strategist
summary:
Hi, I'm Aymen!

Professionally, I pride myself in being an advocate of the employee experience by focusing on a strong customer service initiative, deep diving trends and creating action items accordingly. 
I strive to bring 100% of my positivity to the workplace. I thrive under pressure and enjoy being surrounded by ambiguity and fast pace. In a space of ten years of experience in a multinational companies & organizations, I have built a clear methodology to appreciate my skill in the different area like team management, my language skills, my knowledge in the field of recruitment and my openness to other cultures. 
This background makes me always ready to start a new professional and human experience to challenge myself, more than that, my motto is “always to put people first” in everything i do.

Looking forward to connecting and growing together!
